graph

Class Topic

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.Topic

  • public class Topic
extends java.lang.Object
    A node in the reactive graph that holds a value and notifies subscribed agents when a new Message is published.

    A topic keeps track of two disjoint sets:

    • Subscribers – agents that listen to this topic.
    • Publishers – agents allowed to publish to this topic (not strictly enforced; documented).
    Methods are not thread-safe; concurrent access must be externally synchronised or made through higher-level helpers such as TopicManagerSingleton.
